name: The Broken Dice
description:
Well this is a weird project but some one really fun to do, was hard to produce it and more creating the songs too, the music i will do it better latter x3

Is a crazy dark game, if you accept the challenge, you must complete a JACKPOT with the FIVE dices, but before you have to find those dices.

And try to block the other side of the game, constantly some dices are rolling, changing things and trying to send you to the other side.

You can use your dices you avoid or control some of them but be carefull, they can freeze your dices too.

Remember if you are in the other side you can return with a sacred dice (with your lucky number) or searching the board game (60% chance to return).

And like the titlle said, the are chances to get a broken dice that instantly move you to a darker places.

This idea was for the MiniJAM

Topic - Dread

Limitation - Dice Must be  A Mechanic

Hope you enjoy it and tell me what do you think x3
